description: Detects usage of bitsadmin downloading a file with a suspicious extension
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
name: File With Suspicious Extension Downloaded Via Bitsadmin
query: (((process.executable:/.*\\\\[Bb][Ii][Tt][Ss][Aa][Dd][Mm][Ii][Nn]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/) OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:/[Bb][Ii][Tt][Ss][Aa][Dd][Mm][Ii][Nn]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/)) AND process.command_line:(/.*\ \/[Tt][Rr][Aa][Nn][Ss][Ff][Ee][Rr]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \/[Cc][Rr][Ee][Aa][Tt][Ee]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \/[Aa][Dd][Dd][Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee]\ .*/) AND process.command_line:(/.*\.7[Zz].*/ OR /.*\.[Aa][Ss][Aa][Xx].*/ OR /.*\.[Aa][Ss][Hh][Xx].*/ OR /.*\.[Aa][Ss][Mm][Xx].*/ OR /.*\.[Aa][Ss][Pp].*/ OR /.*\.[Aa][Ss][Pp][Xx].*/ OR /.*\.[Bb][Aa][Tt].*/ OR /.*\.[Cc][Ff][Mm].*/ OR /.*\.[Cc][Gg][Ii].*/ OR /.*\.[Cc][Hh][Mm].*/ OR /.*\.[Cc][Mm][Dd].*/ OR /.*\.[Dd][Ll][Ll].*/ OR /.*\.[Gg][Ii][Ff].*/ OR /.*\.[Jj][Pp][Ee][Gg].*/ OR /.*\.[Jj][Pp][Gg].*/ OR /.*\.[Jj][Ss][Pp].*/ OR /.*\.[Jj][Ss][Pp][Xx].*/ OR /.*\.[Ll][Oo][Gg].*/ OR /.*\.[Pp][Nn][Gg].*/ OR /.*\.[Pp][Ss]1.*/ OR /.*\.[Pp][Ss][Mm]1.*/ OR /.*\.[Rr][Aa][Rr].*/ OR /.*\.[Ss][Cc][Ff].*/ OR /.*\.[Ss][Cc][Tt].*/ OR /.*\.[Tt][Xx][Tt].*/ OR /.*\.[Vv][Bb][Ee].*/ OR /.*\.[Vv][Bb][Ss].*/ OR /.*\.[Ww][Aa][Rr].*/ OR /.*\.[Ww][Ss][Ff].*/ OR /.*\.[Ww][Ss][Hh].*/ OR /.*\.[Xx][Ll][Ll].*/ OR /.*\.[Zz][Ii][Pp].*/))
